TopicTitle: Ferram Aerospace Research will ever be updated to 1.5.1?

Articles.Content:
I just need this. the mod looks soo god but it isnt updated to the latest ksp version and is just too old to try if it works...

 

Anyone knows if it will be updated, or any way to make it work in the current Ksp Version?

30 minutes ago, JoaquinJAR said:

I just need this. the mod looks soo god but it isnt updated to the latest ksp version and is just too old to try if it works...

 

Anyone knows if it will be updated, or any way to make it work in the current Ksp Version?

Did you even bother checking the FAR thread?

Yes, But the only thing i know from there is that it has a patch made by a user  that updates it 1.4.1 but i still thing its too outdated

 

right?


EDIT: Can you put a link of the FAR thread you are talking about? just to be sure 

EDIT 2: Lol i found it. I checked it but when i checked that post wasnt there.

 

anyways thanks, even that you didnt put a link or nothing lol

Edited October 27, 2018 by JoaquinJAR

So wait, you post asking about the update 5 hours after the update was posted in the far thread, which seemed to indicate you either didn't check the FAR thread, or at least had not checked it recently before posting. Yet I'm the one getting flak for not going through the extra effort of spoon feeding you a link?

Just making sure.

Likely one of the active modders will at least post a PR with the dll's updated soon. Alternatively all the source code is available and require zero non-free software.

oh wait look a PR ... https://github.com/ferram4/Ferram-Aerospace-Research/pull/227
